fullDescription.intro: Returns the list of users registered in the course or courses indicated in the input table (output from Moodle Courses node).
fullDescription.option: Returns only users with the 'student' role.
Anonymizes user ids and user names (fake data).

Numerical value of the random seed. Use 0 if you do not want to apply a random seed. With a value other than 0, the same random results will always be generated for both the user id and the user name.

ports.inPort: Input table containing a list of valid Courses (output from Moodle Courses node)
